pages.text: By simply mixing some $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Aqua Cerate$() with $(item)Dye$(), handy, throwable Dye can be crafted.$(br)This Witchy Dye is used primarily to tint worn equipment, but it can also be used to dye $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$().

To create Witchy Dye, first brew Witchy Bleach in your $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Cauldron$().$(br)You can add its dyeing properties by combining it with any Dye, otherwise it'll act as a bleach to remove color.
The following $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() will randomly dye any Witchy Bleach added to it.$(br)Do note that the bleach to be dyed needs to be added after starting the Ritual.
